name: Ghost Raccoon - Sprinter Cell
description:
Ghost Raccoon is a Coop stealth game where you play as a raccoon soul which can travel between bodies to get to his favourite experience - food.

Swap between the two raccoons where only one can move at a time and hide from the evil guards to finish the levels. Also use trash cans to hide from them or just stay out of their sight.

Team

  • Christof Bachmann
  • Andreas Tscheinig
  • Alexander Lercher
  • Sarah Wachter
  • Peter Waysocher
  • Christoph Wedenig

Controls

  • B / Right Trigger: Make noise
  • Left Control-Stick: Move around
  • Left-Trigger: Soul swap

Disclaimer: Developed during the 3 days of the 3rd Winter GameJam . The theme was "Unconventional Travel", the diversifier "Racoon".
